note: I am an occupational therapist and work in a Community Mental Health Team in Cornwall. I live with Martyn and our spaniel cross Reggie. I have lived in Cheshire, Derbyshire, Suffolk, Merseyside, North Yorkshire, and currently the Tamar Valley. In my spare time, I enjoy reading, watching films and TV, walking, nature, the countryside, jigsaws, colouring, and embroidery. My main hobby is taking photos of Devon, Cornwall, and sometimes further a field. I'm also practising my street photography.

Archaeologist, photographer, lepidopterist, dog-lover, guitarist, vagabond troubadour. #Toriesout
#GOPout #Socialist #Resist #FBR #BLM #NHS 🌊3.5%🐟

Big fan of:

2)Content Warnings for all appropriate content

note:
Abigail's Army - A Progressive Disney Group
We are Disney fans who believe in a broad range of progressive ideas which we understand can be a contradiction at times, but nonetheless, here we are.
We want to praise the actions that the Disney Company takes which embrace diversity and inclusion and we want to have constructive conversations about actions that don't.
Not in any way affiliated with or representative of Abigail Disney, though we admire her quite a bit.
